content: Hello, I need help with my order.
I'd be happy to help you with your order. Could you please provide your order number?

Thank you for providing your order number. I can see that your order #12345 was shipped yesterday and should arrive within 2-3 business days. Is there anything specific about the order you'd like to know?

Our business hours are Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM Eastern Time, and Saturday from 10 AM to 4 PM. We are closed on Sundays and holidays. Is there anything specific you'd like to know about our services?
Can you explain how your return policy works?

I'd be happy to explain our return policy. You can return any unused item within 30 days of purchase with the original receipt for a full refund. For items returned without a receipt, we offer store credit at the current selling price. Items that show signs of wear or were purchased more than 30 days ago may be eligible for exchange or store credit at a reduced value, subject to manager approval. Would you like more details about specific return scenarios?

For damaged items, our policy is different. If you received an item that was damaged during shipping or has a manufacturing defect, please contact us within 7 days of receiving the item. You can email customer service with photos of the damage, and we'll arrange a replacement or full refund without requiring you to return the damaged item in most cases. Does this address your concern about damaged items?
